item.title: Admins cannot trade/attack
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

i have been trying to make it so admins cannot trade and attack.

i tryed this code for the trade:

WanneTradeWith = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); client other = (client)server.playerHandler.players[WanneTradeWith]; if(other.playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("Admins cannot trade."); return; } WanneTrade = 1; break;

i compiled with no errors but i could still trade other admins/others.

if anyone can fix this code or change it a little and tell me a code for the attack one please.

please help,

thanks,

Read full topic
